message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to revolutionize your daily tasks and streamline your workflow. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $12000. Let's start with an offer of $15000. I'm confident this investment will pay off in the long run.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
